main event: A bright white light, resembling the size of an auto headlight, was observed at Pennerlil AFB, N.F. on June 1, 1957.
interesting points: The object was seen at an altitude of 9,000 feet, The sighting lasted approximately 180 seconds, The source of the observation was military, The object was initially thought to be not ground-controlled but possibly a balloon, The sighting was recorded in Project Blue Book.
